Maven Mojo - Talend Job Builder
Last Published: 2017-06-23  | Version: 6.4.1
Maven Mojo - Talend Job Builder
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

ci.builder:generate

Full name:

org.talend:ci.builder:6.4.1:generate

Description:

Use the commandline server mode to generate job sources. When using this Maven plugin, make sure that your commandline is running on the same server.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-sources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
commandlineWorkspace String - Commandline workspace directory.
User property is: commandline.workspace.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
commandlineHost String - Commandline hostname or IP address.
Default value is: localhost.
User property is: commandline.host.
commandlinePort int - Commandline port.
Default value is: 8002.
User property is: commandline.port.
commandlineUser String - Commandline login user.
Default value is: jobbuilder@talend.com.
User property is: commandline.user.
deployVersion String - Specify project version for all poms. If not set, the commandline product version will be used.
User property is: deploy.version.
itemFilter String - Filter for the items to build.
User property is: itemFilter.
projectsTargetDirectory String - Directory of generated projects sources.
Default value is: ${basedir}/projectSources.
User property is: projectsTargetDirectory.

Parameter Details

commandlineHost:

Commandline hostname or IP address.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: commandline.host
  • Default: localhost

commandlinePort:

Commandline port.
  • Type: int
  • Required: No
  • User Property: commandline.port
  • Default: 8002

commandlineUser:

Commandline login user.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: commandline.user
  • Default: jobbuilder@talend.com

commandlineWorkspace:

Commandline workspace directory.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: commandline.workspace

deployVersion:

Specify project version for all poms. If not set, the commandline product version will be used.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: deploy.version

itemFilter:

Filter for the items to build.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: itemFilter

projectsTargetDirectory:

Directory of generated projects sources.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: projectsTargetDirectory
  • Default: ${basedir}/projectSources
